snippet: Party officials want to skip the kind of bruising, expensive battle that they feel hobbled Joseph J. Lhota in his 2013 bid for New York mayor....

headline.main: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76

lead_paragraph: Party officials want to skip the kind of bruising, expensive battle that they feel hobbled Joseph J. Lhota in his 2013 bid for New York mayor.
